One GREAT feature is the pictures that are displayed when not in use.  I leave the TV on and it provides great art to the room!
author: Casey Caster

review: So I bought this device in order to stream stuff on putlocker, nbaliveonline, solarmovie, and free project tv. I had a lot of problems to start with especially with Chrome running on windows. First off, When the Google Cast extension is added for my windows x64 system, by itself it's not a big deal, but when it goes to websites like Solarmovie, it goes INSANE on my CPU - it runs it at 100% and I thought it was because of the loading (it's not), even when the loading of the video is done, the CPU is still running 100%. I thought this could be a spyware issue, so I ran my anti-spyware software, deleted all my cookies, temp files, etc - made no difference. Also the CPU was not affected after I turn on/off my adblock plus, so it's not that extension. What I found out was this was an extension issue of Google Cast - when I turn it off, my CPU goes back to normal. Note also, I am running an older computer (running Intel Celeron 925 @ 2.30 Ghz). So this is a huge issue, because my stream on my tv is TERRIBLE, consistently skipping!So I switched to my android tablet, which has a Dual core, 1000 MHz processor. I searched through the forums to download an app called "Web Video Caster" and downloaded it. Then I streamed solarmovie, and BAM! works like a charm!
